Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Stomach Diseases/Gastric Dilatation
Record.Description: Abnormal distention of the STOMACH due to accumulation of gastric contents that may reach 10 to 15 liters. Gastric dilatation may be the result of GASTRIC OUTLET OBSTRUCTION; ILEUS; GASTROPARESIS; or denervation.
